Title: MELTCORE 6 Login Timeout Issue
Issue: Users are unable to log in to MELTCORE 6. The login screen loads but after entering credentials, the page times out.
Solution: Restart the MELTCORE Authentication Service and clear server-sIde session cache. Ensure the LDAP/Active Directory connection is active.
Discussion: This issue is commonly caused by expired authentication tokens or a stalled session handler. It occurs more frequently after a server patch or network outage. If the LDAP server is reachable, restarting the authentication microservice resolves the issue without requiring user password resets.

Title: Inventory Module Not Updating Stock Levels
Issue: Stock quantities remain unchanged after completing purchase orders in the Inventory module.
Solution: Trigger manual synchronization from the 'System Maintenance → Sync Inventory Data' menu, then restart the Inventory Processing Service.
Discussion: The issue is usually caused by a stuck background job (StockUpdateWorker) that processes completed purchase orders. When the worker queue is overloaded or fails, synchronization stops. A restart and manual sync ensures pending data is processed.

Title: Slow Performance on Sales Dashboard
Issue: Sales dashboard takes more than 2 minutes to load and sometimes fails with a 'Request Timeout' error.
Solution: Run database index optimization on the 'sales_transactions' table and purge logs older than 6 months using the Cleanup Utility.
Discussion: Performance degradation is typically linked to large data volumes and fragmented indexes. Purging old data and reindexing significantly improves response time. In high-traffic periods, enabling dashboard cache in the system settings also helps.

Title: MELTCORE 6 Fails to Generate PDF Invoices
Issue: When generating invoices as PDF, the system returns 'Document Rendering Error: Template Missing'.
Solution: Re-upload the default invoice template under Admin → Document Templates and restart the PDF Rendering Service.
Discussion: This usually happens when the template file is accIdentally removed or corrupted during deployment. The rendering engine depends on a preloaded .rpt template. A missing template prevents PDF generation entirely.

Title: Purchase Order Approval Workflow Stuck in Pending State
Issue: Submitted purchase orders remain in 'Pending Approval' even after managers approve them.
Solution: Restart the Workflow Engine service and clear the 'pending_approvals' queue from the Workflow Admin Panel.
Discussion: The approval status is stored in a workflow queue. If the workflow engine crashes or a process within it hangs, approvals are not propagated to the database. Clearing the queue and restarting the engine reprocesses the approvals.

Title: Incorrect Financial Report Totals
Issue: Monthly financial reports show incorrect totals due to missing journal entries from certain departments.
Solution: Run 'Recalculate Ledger' from Finance Tools, verify department posting rules, and ensure all journal batches are closed before report generation.
Discussion: Reports pull data only from closed journal batches. If departments submit journals but do not finalize them, the report excludes those entries. Recalculation forces MELTCORE 6 to rebuild financial aggregates from journal data.
